channel.title: Essence (no glitch) script request
channel.description: Hey guys...I've been using aryan for abit, my request shouldn't be too hard to fulfill since essence mining is the most common, I'd like a working essence miner script, does NOT have to be the fastest at all, but I'd like if it had NO glitches...example is standing in the essence mine at the corner doing nothing or in the middle of the entire essence mine...confused which way to go, etc. I'd really appreciate this and if I like the script I will remember you for the future and hook you up with some cash....but expecting this script to be free or not expensive...no noobs too please, I'm just trying to get this going right and hoping for your assistance. [br][size=1]Posted at: March 19, 2006, 10:15:21 am[/size][hr]not a single view or answer yet.. =(, thought this site would be more convenient.

item.title: Essence (no glitch) script request
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

I use Eric’s Essminer. It is pretty sweet and hasn’t really glitched on me yet [except for a few user errors on my part]. It also includes a auto-updating status window, telling how much you mined, what the script is currently doing, how many loads, and your ess per min.

I included the file. [ cmd= /em2() ]

Read full topic

Hey guys…I’ve been using aryan for abit, my request shouldn’t be too hard to fulfill since essence mining is the most common, I’d like a working essence miner script, does NOT have to be the fastest at all, but I’d like if it had NO glitches…example is standing in the essence mine at the corner doing nothing or in the middle of the entire essence mine…confused which way to go, etc.
